Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photographs show a real-life fallen angel, when in fact they depict an art installation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim of a real fallen angel.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photographs depict a real fallen angel without questioning the authenticity or investigating further.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photographs are of an art installation created by artists Sun Yuan and Peng Yu.
